dependencies.description: Microsoft Azure Core Library for Python.
dependencies.name: py-azure-core

dependencies.description:
cryptography is a package which provides cryptographic recipes and
primitives to Python developers
dependencies.name: py-cryptography

dependencies.description:
The Microsoft Authentication Library (MSAL) for Python library enables
your app to access the Microsoft Cloud by supporting authentication of
users with Microsoft Azure Active Directory accounts (AAD) and Microsoft
Accounts (MSA) using industry standard OAuth2 and OpenID Connect.
dependencies.name: py-msal

dependencies.description:
The Microsoft Authentication Extensions for Python offers secure
mechanisms for client applications to perform cross-platform token cache
serialization and persistence. It gives additional support to the
Microsoft Authentication Library for Python (MSAL).
dependencies.name: py-msal-extensions

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description:
The typing_extensions module contains both backports of these changes as
well as experimental types that will eventually be added to the typing
module, such as Protocol (see PEP 544 for details about protocols and
static duck typing).
dependencies.name: py-typing-extensions

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description: Cloud-native genomic dataframes and batch computing (Python API)
dependent_to.name: py-hail

dependent_to.description:
A Snakemake executor plugin for submitting jobs to Microsoft Azure
Batch.
dependent_to.name: py-snakemake-executor-plugin-azure-batch

dependent_to.description: A Snakemake storage plugin to read and write from Azure Blob Storage.
dependent_to.name: py-snakemake-storage-plugin-azure

dependent_to.description:
Workflow management system to create reproducible and scalable data
analyses.
dependent_to.name: snakemake

description: Microsoft Azure Identity Library for Python.
name: py-azure-identity
